bike.description: Cr-Mo main frame, No Oval Head tube, weld on rotor plate, seat-stay mounted X-wire "U" brake bosses, w/ braze on cable stops, 6mm dropouts, Wrap gusset BB yoke, Tube seat-stay bridge

components.description: Specialized threadless, 1-1/8", reinforced steerer, w/ 1-1/8" Cr-Mo blades, 6mm drop-outs, w/ 38mm OD fork adapters
"Dozer" threadless, 1-1/8", oversized lower cup, with SST ORYG 1-1/8 Rotor
Specialized, forged alloy, bottom-load, 45mm reach
Specialized 2-piece, 150mm rise, 600mm width, 8 degree back-sweep, 2 degree up-sweep
Specialized No-flange, Kraton, 114mm
Dia-Tech 996 "Hombre", u-brake w/ "Fiesta" soft compound pads
Tektro SBL-89, u-brake lever, 16mm cable pull
Shimano SFMX-30, 1/2" x 1/8", 16T, chrome plated
KMC Z-510, 1/2" x 1/8", w/ Anti-drop inner links, 88 links
Specialized StrongArm II, 3-piece, forged/heat-treated Cr-Mo, left & right drive compatible, 10mm crank arms
Solid alloy disc, 44t, 5mm thick, CNC'd center/drive hole and teeth
Specialized, sealed cartridge, 8 spline, 19mm Cr-Mo spindle, alloy cups
9/16", Cr-Mo axle, alloy platform, w/ press pins
Alex MX-22, 36h, alloy, single wall, deep profile, ground side wall, braking surface
Specialized "Wide Load", alloy, 36h, hollow 14mm Cr-Mo axle, double sealed mechanism
Specialized "Flip Side", alloy, 36h, 14mm hollow Cr-Mo axle, right & left side F/W thread, double sealed mechanism
13g UCP, w/brass nipples
Specialized "TJ", 20 x 2.125", bead to bead tread, black wall
Specialized "TJ", 20 x 2.125", bead to bead tread, black wall
20" x 2.125", schraeder valve
Specialized Jumping, w/8mm rails and X-brace
Alloy micro adjust, 30.9mm/300mm for 8mm rails
Specialized forged alloy, 2-bolt
Specialized alloy fork cap w/washer, chain tesioners, chain guard cover, reflectors, owners manual
